parameters.name: AuthConf
parameters.description: The origin authentication information of the CNAME record.

parameters.name: BizName
parameters.description:
The business scenario of the record for acceleration. Leave the parameter empty if your record is not proxied. Valid values:

*   **video_image**: video and image.
*   **api**: API.
*   **web**: web page.

parameters.name: Data
parameters.description: The DNS record information. The format of this field varies based on the record type. For more information, see [Add DNS records](https://www.alibabacloud.com/help/doc-detail/2708761.html).

parameters.name: HostPolicy
parameters.description:
The origin host policy. This policy takes effect when the record type is CNAME. You can set the policy in two modes:

*   **follow_hostname**: match the requested domain name.
*   **follow_origin_domain**: match the origin's domain name.

parameters.name: Proxied
parameters.description:
Specifies whether to proxy the record. Only CNAME and A/AAAA records can be proxied. Valid values:

*   **true**
*   **false**

parameters.name: RecordId
parameters.description: The record ID, which can be obtained by calling [ListRecords](~~2850265~~).

parameters.name: SourceType
parameters.description:
The type of the origin for the CNAME record. This parameter is required when you add a CNAME record. Valid values:

*   **OSS** : OSS origin.
*   **S3** : S3 origin.
*   **LB**: Load Balancer origin.
*   **OP**: origin in an origin pool.
*   **Domain**: common domain name.

If you leave the parameter empty or set its value as null, the default is Domain, which is common domain name.

parameters.name: Ttl
parameters.description: The TTL of the record. Unit: seconds. The range is 30 to 86,400, or 1. If the value is 1, the TTL of the record is determined by the system.
